NeedDef.label: royal jelly
NeedDef.description: The total amount of royal jelly a Vivi eats affects how it grows. If a Vivi is fully fed by the time it grows up, it becomes a Royal Vivi; if not, it stays a regular Vivi. \nRoyal Vivis can reproduce and are good at interacting and have high psychic sensitivity, but they are not as good at working.
